meanings.definition: The action or process of forming a connection or union between two things.
meanings.sent1: The inosculation of the vines created a strong bond between them.
meanings.sent2: The inosculation of the train tracks allowed for seamless travel.
meanings.sent3: The inosculation of the puzzle pieces was so perfect that it solved itself!
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like the inosculation of roots, growing stronger together.
meanings.sent5: The inosculation of the rivers formed a beautiful merging of waters.

meanings.definition: The point at which two things are joined or united.
meanings.sent1: At the inosculation of the paths, we decided to walk together.
meanings.sent2: The inosculation of the roads led to a bustling intersection.
meanings.sent3: The inosculation of flavors in the dish created a unique taste.
meanings.sent4: Their love was the inosculation of hearts, beating as one.
meanings.sent5: The inosculation of branches in the tree formed a natural canopy.
